ModulePrefs.title: Uservoice for Google Sites
ModulePrefs.description: Add support and feedback features provided by Uservoice service to your Google Site
ModulePrefs.author: Serge Populov

Module.Content:
<!-- UserVoice JavaScript SDK (only needed once on a page) -->
	<script>
        var prefs = new gadgets.Prefs();

	(function(){
		var uv=document.createElement('script');
		uv.type='text/javascript';
		uv.async=true;
		uv.src='//widget.uservoice.com/' + pref_uv_id + '.js';
		var s=document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
		s.parentNode.insertBefore(uv,s);
	})()
	</script>

	<!-- A tab to launch the Classic Widget -->
	<script>
	UserVoice = window.UserVoice || [];
	UserVoice.push(['showTab', 'classic_widget', {
	  mode: prefs.getString("uv_mode"),
	  primary_color: '#364149',
	  link_color: '#007dbf',
	  default_mode: 'feedback',
	  forum_id: 209537,
	  tab_label: 'Feedback & Support',
	  tab_color: prefs.getString("uv_tab_color"),
	  tab_position: 'middle-right',
	  tab_inverted: true
	}]);
	</script>
